snippet: Steve Ballmer, Microsoft’s chief executive, has replaced Andy Lees, the head of the company’s mobile phone group, with Terry Myerson, left, who has run the group’s engineering effort. The leadership change comes as Microsoft seek...
abstract: Steve Ballmer, Microsoft’s chief executive, has replaced Andy Lees, the head of the company’s mobile phone group, with Terry Myerson, left, who has run the group’s engineering effort. The leadership change comes as Microsoft seeks to use the positive critical response to its mobile phone software to increase the sales of the product.

headline.main: Executive Shuffle in Microsoft Mobile Group

snippet: Suggestions for helping students understand common expository "text structures" like cause and effect, compare and contrast and problem-solution that appear often in The Times. For each, we include Times examples in both print and multimedia
